pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 6 by SSCI.

content.raw:
That is correct. Until last week I was not aware of the `localModel` functionality. I had modified `vehicle_topics.launch`the .ign file, and the `model.sdf` file to get the right sensors working. I copied the `spawnX4` function from the .ign file into the `spawner.rb` file for the PR.

‌
content.html:
That is correct. Until last week I was not aware of the localModel functionality. I had modified vehicle_topics.launchthe .ign file, and the model.sdf file to get the right sensors working. I copied the spawnX4 function from the .ign file into the spawner.rb file for the PR.
